page.title: 20Summary and Contributions
page.content: We have in a tiny way, raised some questions about planning of houses, of transport services, of shops, and giving help to those with problems. Our suvery also shows family leisure patterns and housing mobility. We hope it will tell you something of our lifstyle, our concerns and our responses. { {Compiled by the children of: {Bidston Ave. Junior - Barbara Morrison {Hillside Junior - Jackie Ward {Manor Junior - Graham Johnstone {Our Lady and St. Edward Primary { - Margaret Barrick {Portland Primary - Lee Turley {St.Joseph's Primary - Tom Macbeth {Margaret Liddy of the Environmental { Centre Bidston Hill {Ridgeway High - Phil Phelan (Collator) {Paul Scofield, John Plows, Linda James
